FINANCE if a company recapitalizes or is recapitalized, it gets more capital or changes the way its capital is organized: Two of the country's biggest banks are being recapitalized by foreign investors, who are taking ownership shares for debt. It needs a cash injection of several billion guilders to recapitalize and stay in business.
recapitalization noun [ U ] ( UK also recapitalisation)
The airline has received European Commission approval of its recapitalization.
